item.title: The Journey Behind Velocity Lapse - Part 3
item.description: This is the third post in a series of ‘dev-log’ posts of my personal journey and learning process of creating Velocity Lapse, a time lapse app for Android.

item.title: Life Lessons from 2022
item.description: A reflection of lessons that stand out the most from 2022

item.title: The Journey Behind Velocity Lapse - Part 2

item.title: The Journey Behind Velocity Lapse - Part 1
item.description: This is the start of a series of ‘devlog’ posts of my personal journey and learning process in creating an app called Velocity Lapse, from planning to launch and beyond.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m a web designer and developer based in the U.S. I love doing meaningful work that inspires and helps people, and glorifies Yahweh our Heavenly Father.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: This website does not have analytics or social network buttons that track you.

item.title: Site Colophon
item.description: Wondering how this site is built? It’s a very simple tech stack for this simple, minimalistic site.
